TopicTitle: Continuation of ProbeControlRoom (IVA only playthroughs are hot right now)

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am considering starting up a career mode where i only do the missions IVA. With RasterProp and af few plugins this is possible. The problem arise when you want to deploy probes tho as that would have to be done via the old way due to no IVA. But the ProbeControlRoom changes this, where you can control probes from a mission control:)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17)

Its the last piece of the puzzle for making IVA only playthroughs possible. 

For those who may be interested, the only rules of my new playthrough will be hide hud (F2). Everything else is allowed, except mechjeb. I think its going to be a fun challenge. 

Have a nice day.

What's the request? The topic you link to has a post with a 1.0.2 release already.

- - - Updated - - -

Tho, in your defense, I just saw it's not on the first post. [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17?p=1922070&viewfull=1#post1922070) it is.
